title: Emotion and Learning Integration Strategies for Advanced Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic vocational language proficiency and higher education experience
context.additional_context: Requires content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing practical emotion management strategies applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners will recognize and analyze positive/negative emotions arising during the learning process in contextually appropriate ways.
Learners will use narrative analysis techniques to structure and explain peer examples of emotional experiences.
Learners will apply the Critical Incident Technique (CIT) to identify emotional turning points in their learning experiences and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
